殺.definition: to kill; to slay; to murder; to attack; to weaken; to reduce; (dialect) to smart; (used after a verb) extremely

殺一儆百.definition: lit. kill one to warn a hundred (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others; pour encourager les autres

殺一警百.definition: variant of 殺一儆百|杀一儆百[sha1 yi1 jing3 bai3]

殺人.definition: homicide; to murder; to kill (a person)

殺人不眨眼.definition: to murder without blinking an eye (idiom); ruthless; cold-blooded

殺人不過頭點地.pinyin: sha1 ren2 bu4 guo4 tou2 dian3 di4
殺人不過頭點地.definition: It's all exaggeration, you don't need to take it seriously; a fuss about nothing; nothing to write home about

殺人如草.definition: see 殺人如麻|杀人如麻[sha1ren2-ru2ma2]

殺人如麻.definition: lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom); fig. to kill people like flies

殺人放火.definition: to kill and burn (idiom); murder and arson

殺人滅口.definition: (idiom) to kill sb to prevent them from revealing sth

殺人越貨.definition: to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money

殺價.definition: to beat down the price; to haggle; to slash one's prices

殺出重圍.definition: to force one's way out of encirclement; to break through

殺君馬者道旁兒.pinyin: sha1 jun1 ma3 zhe3 dao4 pang2 er2
殺君馬者道旁兒.definition: lit. bystanders killed the king's horse (idiom) (based on an ancient story in which people along the road cheered a horseman on as he galloped past, until the horse died of exhaustion); fig. beware of becoming complacent when everyone is cheering you on

殺富濟貧.definition: robbing the rich to help the poor

殺彘教子.definition: to kill a pig as a lesson to the children (idiom); parents must teach by example

殺手.definition: killer; murderer; hit man; (sports) formidable player

殺機.definition: desire to commit murder; great danger

殺毒.definition: to disinfect; (computing) to destroy a computer virus

殺氣.definition: murderous spirit; aura of death; to vent one's anger

殺熟.definition: to swindle associates, friends or relatives

殺牛宰羊.definition: slaughter the cattle and butcher the sheep; to prepare a big feast (idiom)

殺球.definition: to spike the ball (volleyball etc); to smash (tennis etc)

殺生.definition: to take the life of a living creature

殺真菌.definition: fungicidal; to have a fungicidal effect

殺菌.definition: to kill germs; to disinfect; to sterilize

殺豬宰羊.definition: to kill the pigs and slaughter the sheep (idiom)

殺豬盤.definition: pig butchering scam (where the scammer builds trust with the victim over time, "fattening them up," before ultimately "slaughtering" them by taking their money); (esp.) romance scam

殺身成仁.definition: (idiom) to die a martyr; to be martyred

殺軟.definition: antivirus software; abbr. for 殺毒軟件|杀毒软件[sha1 du2 ruan3 jian4]

殺進.definition: to storm (a city etc); to raid

殺進殺出.definition: to execute a lightning raid; (investment) to buy, then quickly sell; (tourism) to visit a destination for only a short stay

殺雞儆猴.definition: lit. to kill the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom); fig. to punish an individual as an example to others

殺雞取卵.definition: lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom); fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs

殺雞嚇猴.definition: see 殺雞儆猴|杀鸡儆猴[sha1ji1-jing3hou2]

殺雞宰鵝.definition: kill the chickens and butcher the geese (idiom)

殺雞焉用牛刀.pinyin: sha1 ji1 yan1 yong4 niu2 dao1
殺雞焉用牛刀.definition: don't use a sledgehammer on a nut; aquila non capit muscam

殺雞給猴看.definition: lit. to kill a chicken in front of a monkey; fig. to make an example of sb (by punishment) to frighten others

殺雞駭猴.definition: see 殺雞儆猴|杀鸡儆猴[sha1ji1-jing3hou2]

殺青.definition: to put the last hand to (a book, a film etc); to finalize; to kill-green (a step in the processing of tea leaves)

殺風景.definition: variant of 煞風景|煞风景[sha1 feng1 jing3]

殺馬特.definition: Chinese subculture of young urban migrants, usually of low education, with exaggerated hairstyles, heavy make-up, flamboyant costumes, piercings etc (loanword from "smart")
